```{r load corpus,include=FALSE}
l_star_h_types = c("^[L*]H", "L*H", "L*^[H]", "^[L*H]")

# Load Corpus
m_corpus <- get_m_corpus("../data/m_corpus.csv")  %>%
  # Consolidate nuc_contour based on observation and types of register shift.
  mutate(
    nuc_contour =
      if_else(
        nuc_contour == "^[L*H %]" | nuc_contour == "^[L*H L%]",
        "^[L*H] %",
        if_else(nuc_contour == "L*^[H L%]", "L*^[H] %", nuc_contour)
      ),
    acc_phon =
      factor(
        str_replace(nuc_contour,
                    "\\s%$|\\sL%$",
                    ""),
        levels = c("H*", ">H*", "^[L*]H", "L*H", "L*^[H]", "^[L*H]")
      ),
    fin_phon = str_replace_all(fin_phon, "L%]|%]", "%"),
    fin_phon = factor(fin_phon, levels=unique(fin_phon))
  ) %>%
  # Select only columns for analysis
  select(
    speaker,
    gender,
    mode,
    prompt,
    acc_phon,
    fin_phon,
    lh_mean_f0) %>% 
  filter(acc_phon %in% l_star_h_types)  %>% 
  mutate(acc_phon = factor(acc_phon,
                           levels = l_star_h_types)
         )
```

```{r run initial model,  fig.height=3, fig.width=9, eval=FALSE, tidy = TRUE}

# run model
lh_mean_f0_model <-
    lmer(
        lh_mean_f0 ~ mode * acc_phon + fin_phon + gender + 
          (1 + acc_phon + mode | speaker) + (1 | prompt),
        data = m_corpus,
        control = lmerControl(
            optimizer = "optimx",
            calc.derivs = FALSE,
            optCtrl = list(
                method = "nlminb",
                starttests = FALSE,
                kkt = FALSE
            )
        )
      )


summariseLME(lh_mean_f0_model, run_step=TRUE) %>% print()

```

-   Singularity & convergence issues in maximal model.
-   Running model suggested by step()

```{r run intercepts only model, fig.height=3, fig.width=9, eval=FALSE, tidy = TRUE}

lh_mean_f0_model_reduced <-
    lmer(lh_mean_f0 ~  mode + acc_phon + (1 + mode + acc_phon | speaker),
        data = m_corpus,
        control = lmerControl(
            optimizer = "optimx",
            calc.derivs = FALSE,
            optCtrl = list(
                method = "nlminb",
                starttests = FALSE,
                kkt = FALSE
            )
        )
    )

summariseLME(lh_mean_f0_model_reduced , run_step = TRUE)

```

- Model still returns singularity.
- Rerunning model, intercepts only with original factors.
- This removes singularity issues.

#### `lh_mean_f0 ~ mode * acc_phon + fin_phon + gender + (1 | speaker) + (1 | prompt),)`

```{r trimmed model tested,  fig.height=3, fig.width=9, message = FALSE, tidy = TRUE}


lh_mean_f0_model_intercepts_only <-
    lmer(lh_mean_f0 ~ mode * acc_phon + fin_phon + gender + 
          (1 | speaker) + (1 | prompt),
        data = m_corpus,
        control = lmerControl(
            optimizer = "optimx",
            calc.derivs = FALSE,
            optCtrl = list(
                method = "nlminb",
                starttests = FALSE,
                kkt = FALSE
            )
        )
    )

summariseLME(lh_mean_f0_model_intercepts_only,
              run_step = TRUE,
              write="../output_model_anovas/Mode_PA_lh_mean_f0_anova.csv")
  
```

```{r make tidy model, fig.height=3, fig.width=9, ,  warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, tidy = TRUE}

lh_mean_f0_model.tidy <- analyseModel(lh_mean_f0_model_intercepts_only,
                                write_r2="../output/Mode_PA_lh_mean_f0"
                                )
lh_mean_f0_model.tidy$r2

```
